info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued July 8 at 4:28PM MDT until July 8 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Central El Paso County in western Texas...
* Until 500 PM MDT.
* At 427 PM MDT, an area of blowing dust was over Central El Paso.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong winds up to 40 mph.
SOURCE...Public.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* This includes Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 20 and 33.
Locations impacted include... West El Paso, Central El Paso, East El Paso, Northeast El Paso, Far East El Paso, Mission Valley, Fort Bliss, Socorro, Biggs Field, Fort Bliss Northeast, Franklin Mountains State Park, and McKelligon Canyon.
info.instruction:
Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 5:00 PM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 5:00 PM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued July 8 at 4:28PM MDT until July 8 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 5:00 PM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 5:00 PM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
